front.title: The length of the prefix of an IPv6 link-local address ranges from 10 to 127

abstract.t: A rejected Errata to RFC4291 "IPv6 Addr Archi" on the topic of link- local addresses 'needs' a draft. This is an answer to that need. The length of the prefix of an IPv6 link-local address is variable. The minimal value is 10 decimal. The maximum value is 127 decimal.
